projects.title: Nongpanya
projects.description: A smart medicine dispensing system integrated with a web platform. It automatically selects and dispenses appropriate medication based on user symptoms, using a mapped database of symptoms and treatments.

projects.title: CampusLink
projects.description: A comprehensive university management platform designed to support academic and administrative operations across departments.

projects.title: AllyCall
projects.description: A mobile safety app that allows users to make fake calls, view high-risk locations, and access personal legal rights information for protection and awareness.

projects.title: Redine
projects.description: A mobile app that helps users create new recipes from leftover ingredients, promoting sustainability and reducing food waste.

projects.title: CS First Date 2024
projects.description: A project for the annual freshman orientation event for computer science students, focused on engagement and event coordination.

projects.title: IT3K #19
projects.description: A real-time scoreboard system for IT3K sports events, enabling live match tracking and score updates during competitions.

about.intro: I'm a curious and driven developer who enjoys building real-world solutions through code. I love working across the stack, solving technical challenges, and turning ideas into practical, user-focused applications.
about.description: When I’m not coding, I enjoy staying active through exercise and unwinding with a good comic book.

timeline.title: IoT Engineer Intern
timeline.description: Developed full-stack IoT web applications using modern technologies including Next.js, FastAPI, Flask, MQTT, InfluxDB, and MongoDB, worked on front-end dashboards, back-end APIs, and real-time data pipelines.

timeline.title: Head of Backend Speaker
timeline.description: Led backend development sessions in a 5-day crash course for freshmen, covering Git/GitHub, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, data management, SQL, and deployment.

timeline.title: Java Programming Mentor
timeline.description: Mentored students in Java programming mentoring sessions, teaching core concepts and coding techniques

timeline.title: Hackathon Project Manager
timeline.description: Developed and implemented project timelines, task assignments, and resource management to achieve project objectives, focusing on creating innovations to address, prevent, and raise awareness about mental health issues
